rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports on anticipated detections using neutral language.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports anticipation of future detections but lacks explicit calming language or reassurance.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes ongoing surveillance ('wild bird surveillance continues') and future possibility ('detections will occur') factually without active reassurance.
